structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Present requirements in effect until new regulations filed.
law.text: The requirements for accessibility as established in 815 KAR 40:010 on November 13, 1974, shall remain in effect until such time as the board shall file new regulations pursuant to KRS 198B.260.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
